name: CNCT
0:
”Alexa, turn on intelliPLUG”
”Alexa, turn on intelliPLUG”
”Alexa, turn on my intelliPLUG”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
By this skill, you can control CNCT's intelliPLUG

First step is to setup the CNCT's intelliPLUG config with CNCT App and home router.
Then, upload your account configuration in "me" tab to CNCT device cloud.
Now, you can discover the devices and control your intelliPLUG via Alexa app or Echo.
